title: Intercept Pharmaceuticals (ICPT) Set To Triggers Buy Signal
text:
Intercept Pharmaceuticals (ICPT) Set To Triggers Buy Signal

InTheMoneyStocks.com (Gareth Soloway) Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 05:36AM ET) By

www.investing.com/analysis/intercept-pharmaceuticals-icpt-set-to-triggers-buy-signal-200471740 Intercept Pharmaceuticals (ICPT) Set To Triggers Buy Signal By (Gareth Soloway) | 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 05:36AM ET) By InTheMoneyStocks.com | 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 05:36AM ET)

Follow Shares of Intercept Pharmaceuticals Inc (NASDAQ: ) tagged a double bottom support level yesterday at $58.00. They then reversed and could be putting in a bottoming tail. This may give swing traders an opportunity to buy for a near-term pop. Being a biotech, Intercept Pharma carries more risk but also more reward. Look for a potential pop back towards $85.00. ICPT Daily Chart
